info.title: LARAVEL Rest API DOCUMENTATION for Geotager

post.summary: Submit a guess for a location
post.description: Allows a user to guess the location's coordinates and calculates the error distance. Subtracts points based on the number of previous guesses.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the location to guess

get.summary: Retrieve the best guesses for the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a list of the user's guesses ordered by smallest error distance.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of top guesses to retrieve

get.summary: Retrieve the best guesses from each unique user for a specific location
get.description: Returns the best guess (smallest error distance) from each user for the specified location.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of top guesses to retrieve per user

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination.

post.description: Create a new location with image upload

get.description: Fetch a single location by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the location to fetch

put.description: Update an existing location with optional image upload

delete.description: Delete an existing location and its associated image

get.summary: Get locations for the authenticated user
get.description: Fetch all locations associated with the authenticated user with pagination

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination.

post.description: Uploads a new image or updates the existing image for a specific location.

delete.description: Deletes the image associated with a specific location.
